Formatting data for `verywise`

Serena Defina

Source: vignettes/articles/01-format-data.Rmd
01-format-data.Rmd

The data folder structure

verywise was developed to handle complex datasets, with multiple cohorts/sites and repeated neuroimaging measures. In order to do so, we enforce some conventions. The data directory folder is expected to have a similar structure to that pictured below:

Brain data

Phenotype data
